home.title: Home
home.description: Discover trusted reviews and ratings of doctors, restaurants, hospitals, parks, schools and many more businesses on our platform. Find the best services and places in your area, shared by real users to help you make informed decisions

metadata.downloadDescription: Download Welp app and search for high rated restaurants, doctors, businesses, or any other services around you. Social Reviews is a powerful community way for a real recommendation and feed back. Get coupons and discounts from your favorite place.

downloadWelpApp.redirect: Redirecting you to the download page...
downloadWelpApp.didNotRedirect: If there was a problem and you were not redirected to the download page click here

home.download: Download the app and get the benefits
home.available: Available on Google Play and App Store
home.exploreCities: Discover the most beautiful cities of Egypt like you've never seen before. Recommendations for the best places to go out and have fun.

forBusinesses.presence: Have a strong presence on Welp to attract more potential customers and improve your SEO.
forBusinesses.maintain: Maintain your page and update your business information on Welp for free. Respond to reviews and build trust with your customers.
forBusinesses.addPortfolio: Add your portfolio, menu, and photos to showcase your business.
forBusinesses.benefitsDescription: Being on Welp will boost your search engine ranking, making it easier for people to find you on Google and other search engines. It’s free advertising for your business. Your company will have a page on Welp with all your business details, contact information, and photos. Your business will be found when a Welp user searches for a similar business. A great way to reach new customers and grow your business. A great way to get feedback and improve your services and customer experience. Promotions, you can promote your business and add coupons and discounts to attract more customers.
forBusinesses.reviewsDescription: Customer reviews are very powerful, as they are made by real people. Research shows that 49% of customers trust reviews as much as recommendations from friends and family. They feel it is more authentic than any traditional marketing or even influencers. Customers check reviews to make decisions before going somewhere or using a service.

users.header: Find fun places and restaurants near you.
users.getOffers: Take advantage of discounts and offers from various places.
users.search: Find the best doctors, hospitals, or any other medical facilities.
users.allOfThis: The social review and rating platform, all in one place.
users.realReviewsDescription: Use your power of social reviews. Share your reviews.
users.userFriendlyDescription: Search & filter the results. Find the Service you are looking for easily.
users.supportDescription: If you have any questions, suggestions will be happy to contact us.

validation.minSearchLength: Please enter at least 2 letters for the search.
